content.rendered:
Wels Airport in Wels, Austria Address / Phone / Email / Location / Website

Address : Flugplatzstrabe 1, 4600 Wels, Austria

Phone :+43 7242 264990
Fax: +43 7242 26499 12

Email id: office@wmw.at

Hours: NA

Wels Airport Official website: https://www.wmw.at/de/

Direction: View direction here

IATA code: 

ICAO code: LOLW

Services / Facilities at Wels Airport

  • Restaurant
  • Hotels & Accomodation
  • Excursions
  • Events
  • Museum
  • Gallery
  • Gliding schools

Restaurant Reservations & opening times

Phone: +43 677 6381 4878
Hours: Wed – Fri: 10:00 am – 10:00 pm
Saturday: 09:00 am – 10:00 pm
Sunday: 09:00 – 21:00

List of Airports in Austria
